name: TriangleMTB
0:
”Alexa ask trail status what trails are open?”
”Alexa open trail status.”
”Alexa ask trail status if I can ride Briar Chapel?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trail status
des: Provides the same information available at triangleMTB.com. You can ask questions like: What trails are open? Can I ride Beaver Dam? Is San Lee open?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
